abstract: The Cardinals' Albert Pujols heads the list of baseball players on the market this off-season, with the Yankees' C. C. Sabathia and the Mets' Jose Reyes the other top names.
snippet: The Cardinals' Albert Pujols heads the list of baseball players on the market this off-season, with the Yankees' C. C. Sabathia and the Mets' Jose Reyes the other top names.
lead_paragraph: With the World Series over, the hot-stove season begins in earnest as each team sets its sights on contending next year. This free-agent class, though not particularly deep, has an incredibly high end that includes the best hitter and two of the best pitchers in the majors.

headline.main: Free Agent Outlook: Pujols, Sabathia and Reyes Stand Above the Rest
